node.title: 'So silly, it's funny': Dutton laughs off Chinese accusations of 'sabre wielding' over submarine deal
node.alt: Peter Dutton speaks in front of Australian flags
node.description: Wang Xining gave a wide-ranging interview where he slammed Australia's plans to acquire nuclear-powered submarines, warningÂ the government might expose its own citizens to the risk of a nuclear accident.
node.content:
["Defence Minister Peter Dutton has mocked China's acting ambassador to Australia after the envoy called the federal government a \"sabre wielder\" and warned it would damage its international reputation if it tears up a Chinese company's long-term lease of the Port of Darwin.", "Wang Xining gave a wide-ranging interview to the Guardian Australia where he slammed Australia's plans to acquire nuclear-powered submarines and warned the government might expose its own citizens to the risk of a nuclear accident.", "\"There's zero nuclear capacity, technologically, in Australia, that would guarantee you will be trouble free, you will be incident free,\" Mr Wang told Guardian Australia.", "\"And if anything happened, are the politicians ready to say sorry to people in Melbourne and in Adelaide?\"", "China's government responded furiously to Australia's nuclear submarines announcement, and Chinese officials have repeatedly accused the federal government of stoking tensions in the region.", "Australia has brushed off the criticisms, pointing out that its submarine plans are dwarfed by China's massive military expansion.", "The federal government's review of the Darwin Port lease looms as the next flash point in the bilateral relationship with China.", "", "
Wang Xining said\u00a0he wouldn't be surprised if Australia tore up the 99-year\u00a0Port of Darwin lease.(AAP: Lukas Coch)
", "The acting ambassador said he \"wouldn't be surprised\" if the government stripped the Chinese company Landbridge of its 99-year lease, saying Australia's intelligence agencies wanted to \"stretch [their]\u00a0hand\" into a \"normal business operation\".", "The government is reviewing the future of the lease, which was signed between Landbridge and the Northern Territory government in 2015.", "Some analysts say the lease poses potential national security threats and have called for the government to take action.", "But Mr Wang\u00a0scoffed at that argument and suggested tearing up the lease would drive away international investors, asking \"I wonder whether Australia can afford to break another contract?\"", "", "
Australia is upgrading its submarines with the new fleet to be nuclear-powered.(Royal Australian Navy: Able Seaman James Whittle)
", "
'It's just so silly it's funny'
", "The interview drew a contemptuous response from Mr Dutton, who said Australians should dismiss Mr Wang's remarks.", "\"We don't see it from any other ambassador here in Australia,\" Mr Dutton told Channel 9.", "\"It's quite remarkable. It's not just in Australia,\u00a0it [happens]\u00a0in India and Japan, in most other countries we see this type of diplomacy.", "\"These provocative comical statements \u2014 it's just so silly, it's funny.", "\"They should be dismissed in that vein.\"", "Trade Minister Dan Tehan said the government had not yet made any decision about the Port of Darwin lease.", "\"Ultimately that will depend on the review itself, obviously all these types of reviews have to be very thorough in process and when they're concluded I'm sure it will be provided to government for a decision,\" he said."]
